body_text:
Dear Priya,

Thanks a lot for this swift reply.

These creatives look great, but still will discuss with management and
revert back if at all any modifications are required.

Thanks Again.
body:
Dear Priya,

Also, I'm sharing some references of the signage designs that I feel are better than chains. 

Regard,
Priya
